basics.name: Andy Yu
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

work.company: University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa, College of Education
work.summary: Primary duties include troubleshooting solutions and providing technological support for faculty and students of the College of Education
highlights: Provide in-person and online tech support

work.company: University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa Center on the Family
work.summary: Primary duties included data entry and data basing in addition to clerical work and general office duties.

awards.title: Phi Beta Kappa Member
awards.summary: Current member of the prestigious national honor society, Phi Beta Kappa, in recognition of academic achievement.

awards.title: Undergraduate Research Opportunities Program Funding Recipient
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii Undergraduate Research Opportunities
awards.summary: Granted stipend funding by the University of Hawaii at Mānoa Undergraduate Research Opportunities Program to perform undergraduate research.

awards.title: ASUH Mānoa Research Award Recipient
awards.summary: Granted the Associated Students of the University of Hawaii at Mānoa Research Award to attend 2017 Society for Integrative and Comparative Biology Annual Conference to present research findings.

awards.title: University of Hawaii at Mānoa Department of Microbiology Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Recipient of scholarship recognizing top student academic performance within the University of Hawaii at Mānoa Department of Microbiology.
